item.title: ctextclassics, my First Package
item.description: My latest update is a big one - a milestone! I have authored my first ever R package, and it is available on my Github! The package, while simple, is quite useful. It is an API caller for ctext.org, which allows users to access a potential of at least 130 classical or pre-modern Chinese texts (indexed from an internal data.frame in my package). The three main functions of ctextclassics are get_text("book", "chapter") ,get_books("book"), and the internal dataframe book_list which you should access to know which books and chapters you can call.
